summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Seaview Avenue, from West 60th Street to West 65th Street; by constructing watermains with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9659 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
